page.title: 09A Day In The Life Of Stephen
page.content: 7:10 Wake up and lay in bed. 7:15 Get up and sit on the settee thinking about a few things. 7:30 Mum comes down - we have break fast(cereal,toast) .Then I get dressed and wash and clean my teeth.I get my coat on and get my bag ready. 8: I go to School 9:15 Mr Johns blows the whistle.We go in for registration.We do Maths. 10:30 Assembly 10:45 Breaktime 11:00 Whistle ,then we go in to do some language work. 12:15 Lunchtime.I have a school dinner. 1:30 Whistle , then in to do some Topic,Art or Science work. 2:30 Breaktime 2:45 Whistle ,then in for storytime a look at the newspaper,or a tables test (cont.on p.10)
